compatibility.notes: LGPL-3.0 allows linking with proprietary software under certain conditions, particularly when dynamic linking is used. Static linking may impose stricter requirements.

key_requirements: If you convey a Combined Work, you must provide the Corresponding Application Code.
You may convey the object code of an Application that incorporates material from the Library under terms of your choice, with certain conditions.
license.name: LGPL-3.0
obligations: If you modify the Library, you must ensure that the modified version still operates meaningfully.
You must include a copy of the LGPL-3.0 license when distributing the Library or modified versions.
You must provide a copy of the copyright notice.
